name: THE HOUSE OF THE BREAD
description:
THE BREAD WALK THE EARTH

Only you can save Christmas town from the hordes of demonically  possessed gingerbreadmen.

This is an arcade gun game that can be played with a mouse or a sinden gun

left click shoot

right click reload

middle mouse throws a grenade

kill 10 enemies in a row to get more machine gun ammo

I have only created stage 1 so far but I hope you enjoy it
